suite.name: Login Tests

test.name: Login with valid credentials

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Display You logged into a secure area! Message
Get Successfull Login Message
Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: ${text} = You logged into a secure area! ×
${actual_message} = You logged into a secure area! ×

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Get Location
kw.doc: Returns the current browser window URL.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.
